title: Aimers Intelligence (StudyOS)
description: A proprietary, closed-loop study lifecycle manager. Integrates Google Workspace with a 'Flow State' fluid UI.

sections.title: The 'Second Brain' Ecosystem
sections.content:
This isn't just a timer. It's a **Study Operating System** that lives where I work.

### The Workflow
1. **Planning**: Every night, I write my diary and next-day plan in a **Google Doc**.
2. **Sync**: At **11:45 PM**, a custom script runs, parsing the doc and syncing tasks to my Calendar.
3. **Execution**: The next day, the `aimers.neubofy.bar` dashboard reads these Calendar events to set my daily targets.

sections.title: The Liquid UI & Flow State
sections.content:
The dashboard features a **Dynamic Water-Filling Animation**. 

- It acts as a hybrid **Stopwatch/Timer**.
- As I study, the water rises to match the percentage of my daily target achieved.
- This visual feedback loop is directly synced with the Google Calendar events, adjusting in real-time if my schedule changes.

sections.title: AI-Powered Accountability
sections.content:
I built a **Podcast Generator** pipeline. 

The system reads my daily reflection Doc and execution data, then uses GenAI to synthesize a **Podcast-Style Audio Summary** sent to my email each morning. 

> *It acts as a brutally honest accountability partner, 'roasting' me if my 'Planned vs. Actual' algorithm detects slack.*
